data.title: Largest nightclub venue in Roseville
data.text: They did a great job of a total makeover on this place...good variety of music venues...large dance floor...nice layout of room and large bar off to one side...and best clean large restrooms for a club setting

data.title: Great place, nice building, enjoyable experience
data.text: The place is awesome, the building is beautiful and the people are amazing. All in all it was an enjoyable experience.

data.title: Good experience!
data.text: This is quite an an interesting place which offers a good experience. The building is very beautiful and the people were courteous.

data.title: Great Club for over 30
data.text: Large dance floor, beautiful building, definitely the nicest club in Roseville. The band was great, it was a lot of fun.

data.title: Good dance spot
data.text: We're visiting from upstate New York and went there with friends who live here and they go every week.   Parking easy across the street, well lit area.  Other dancers were friendly and courteous on the dance floor.   We were surprised to see their version of several dances were exactly like ours in NY!   Would recommend this as a top place to dance locally.

data.title: Great stage and dance floor
data.text: Has a great bar down stairs. Upstairs is a stage , bar , dance floor. Can get a little crowded but very fun. Food was good and served hot. Fun night club.

data.title: Renewed area of the Old Town
data.text: The parking lot is right across the street. Lighting is good. The bar is downstairs, and the Dance ballroom is upstairs. The old wood floor has been well cared for. The air conditioning worked well.  Be sure and check the calendar for current schedules. We took a West Coast Swing class on a Tuesday evening. Everyone was quite friendly. They have a bar upstairs, where you can buy food, and drinks. The restrooms were clean.
